cards.rules_text:
{2}{W}: Unfortunate Shipmender gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {5}{W}{W}, Exile Unfortunate Shipmender from your graveyard: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

As long as it's your turn, Valeyan Gateguard has first strike.
Convert [i]({T}: Target creature you control switches its power and toughness until end of turn.)[/i]

When Merchant of the Underpass enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target tapped creature.
{1}, {T}: Add {R} or {G}.
As long as you control five or more lands, Fogbound Elemental has flying.
Mistborn Unicorn gets +0/+1 for each land you control.
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {3}{W}, Exile Drowned Harpy from your graveyard: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

Flying
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {3}{W}{W}, Exile Desiccated Mothling from your graveyard: Destroy target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its mana value. Activate only as a sorcery.
Convert [i]({T}: Target creature you control switches its power and toughness until end of turn.)[/i]

When Lost in the Fog enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Lost in the Fog leaves.
Whenever a permanent you control transforms, you may exile Lost in the Fog. If you do, return it to the battlefield.

Choose one — 
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Scry X, where X is the power of target creature you control, then draw a card.

Destroy target tapped creature.
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {1}{W}, Exile Clear Up from your graveyard: Exile target card from a graveyard.
Target attacking creature you control gains first strike until end of turn. If that creature's power is higher than its toughness, scry 1, then draw a card.

Convert [i]({T}: Target creature you control switches its power and toughness until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever Ethereal Burdener becomes tapped, you may pay {1}. When you do, tap target creature.

Convert [i]({T}: Target creature you control switches its power and toughness until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever Valeyan Battalion Captain becomes tapped, creatures you control get +1/+0 and vigilance until end of turn.

During your turn, Quickdraw Thug has first strike.
Whenever Quickdraw Thug deals combat damage to a player, scry X, where X is its power.

Lifelink
Whenever Valeyan Martial Guard attacks, if it has power 3 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

Flying, vigilance
Convert [i]({T}: Target creature you control switches its power and toughness until end of turn.)[/i]
When Mountainborn Angel converts a creature, put a vigilance counter on that creature.

When Scout of the Great Plains enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a Plains card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Flash
When All-Seeing Guardian enters, you may return another target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
Whenever a permanent you control transforms, create a 2/2 white Elemental creature token.

Vigilance
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {1}{W}{W}, Exile Curious Treasure Diver from your graveyard: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it and put it into your hand, then shuffle.

When Savacide Etherealist enters, scry 2.
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {1}{W}, Exile Savacide Etherealist from your graveyard: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield.
Return target creature you control with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Whenever a permanent you control transforms, you gain 2 life. If this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn, draw a card.
Destroy target creature. Its controller gains X life, where X is the difference in power between that creature and target creature you control.

Flying
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

Gemchannel Golem gets +0/+1 for each charge counter on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Gemchannel Golem: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities or cast noncreature spells.

When Merchant of the North enters, create a Treasure token.
{1}, {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

Flying
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {1}{U}, Exile Desiccated Aven from your graveyard: Put a flying counter on target creature.

Vigilance
{U}, {T}: Put a charge counter on target artifact you control.

Flying
{2}{U}, {T}: Scry 2. You may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into your hand.

Counter target noncreature spell.
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {2}{U}, Exile Wash Ashore from your graveyard: Draw a card.

Target creature you control gets +0/+2 and hexproof until end of turn.
Scry 1. If you control a Mist, draw a card instead.

Put a charge counter on each of up to two target artifacts you control.
Draw a card.
Draw two cards. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.

Enchant creature
When Gemspark Prison enters, you may put a charge counter on target artifact you control.
Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/2 and loses all abilities.

Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {2}{U}, Exile Drowned Memories from your graveyard: Target player mills four cards.

Choose one — 
• Target attacking creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of lands you control.
• Return target artifact or enchantment to its owner's hand.

Vigilance
Whenever you draw a card, you may put a charge counter on target artifact you control.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.

Flying
Whenever an artifact you control enters, put a charge counter on each artifact you control.

When Sea-Mad Pirate enters or leaves, mill two cards.
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {2}{U}{U}, Exile Sea-Mad Pirate from your graveyard: Surveil 2, then draw a card.

Flying
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {2}{U}, Exile Wisp of Glimmers from your graveyard: Search your library for an artifact card with mana value 3 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever Undead Tentacle blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Flying
Whenever Brilliant Mechfly deals combat damage to a player, put a charge counter on it.
Remove a charge counter from Brilliant Mechfly: Scry 2.

Counter target spell.
[i]Evaporate[/i] — {3}{U}{U}, Exile Twice Drowned from your graveyard: Counter target spell.
Draw three cards, then discard a card unless you control a Mist.

{T}, Remove a charge counter from Shadow Atlas: Surveil 2, then draw a card. [i](To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on Spellslinger Gem.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Spellslinger Gem: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells.

Whenever an artifact you control leaves the battlefield, put all charge counters from that artifact onto Arcane Battery.
At the beginning of your upkeep, move up to two charge counters from Arcane Battery to target artifact you control.

Haste
When Returned Ranksman dies, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token.

When Savacide Unearther enters, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Menace
When Brier Slopes Brute enters, Soldiers you control gain menace until end of turn.

[i]Evaporate[/i] — {1}{B}, Exile Drag to the Depths from your graveyard: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, remove X charge counters from artifacts you control.
X target creatures you control get +1/+0 and deathtouch until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast Harvest Intelligence, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards. If the sacrificed creature was a Soldier, target opponent loses 2 life.

cards.rules_text: Target player discards two cards. You lose 2 life and mill three cards.

Whenever a Soldier you control dies, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

Menace

Clockwork Lich's power is equal to the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.

Whenever a Soldier you control dies, Harvester of Sin gets +1/+1 and deathtouch until end of turn.

Deathtouch
Whenever a creature you control dies or a card leaves your graveyard, put a charge counter on target artifact.

When Disease in the Ranks enters, target player discards a card and loses 1 life.
Whenever a creature you control dies, you may return Disease in the Ranks to its owner's hand.
Destroy target creature with mana value 4 or less.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature or artifact.
Surveil 2. If you sacrificed a permanent this turn, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
